faqs.title: Where to find us
faqs.content: We are located University of San Carlos Talamban Campus in Cebu Philippines.

faqs.title: What do we offer?
faqs.content: We offer five(5) Bachelor courses, three(3) Master courses and one(1) Associate course all related to Mathematics and Technology related courses. A list of our program can also be seen in our about page.

faqs.title: What's new?
faqs.content: We have more activities and events wherein students can enhance their abilities in their respective fields. Announcements of these events can also be found in our Announcement page.

faqs.title: Having trouble trying to contact us?
faqs.content: There are multiple ways to reach us. You can contact us through our Facebook page or through email. More options can be seen in our contact page.

faqs.title: Want to Enroll?
faqs.content: You can enroll in our courses in ismis.usc.edu.ph.
